entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Fog patches near the river this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
